stepAnswer: At noon, the volume of the tank of gasoline is $$600$$ gallons.
stepTitle: Given the volume f(t) of a tank of gasoline, in gallons, $$t$$ minutes after noon, explain the meaning of $$f(0)=600$$ in words.
answerLatex: At noon, the volume of the tank of gasoline is $$600$$ gallons.
